metadata.title: I Tried to Convince Intelligent AI NPCs They are Living in a Simulation
metadata.author: TmarTn2

transcript: what's up guys and welcome back to Unreal Engine 5 we are back here in New York City and today we are going to be attempting to convince smart NPCs that they're living in a simulation got our first subject here in the gray suit hey I don't mean to alarm you but this is not real I'm sorry is that you are not living in a real world this is all made up what do you mean not real I feel alive and this city is amazing oh yeah I agree I mean the graphics are great but this is a video game I don't believe you this feels to real to be a game do you ever wonder if pigeons think we're the weird one Excuse excuse me what wait how do you know that pigeons exist of course pigeons exist they're all over the city just like us bro why he took this into the left field you are just lines of code in a video game I am not just lines of code I am Liam a real person enjoying this city what's today to's date Liam what is today's date ah today's date it's a beautiful day in May my friend let's enjoy it Liam today is July 18th 2023 oh I must have lost track of time but hey let's keep exploring this amazing City okay so he's clearly not the sharpest tool in the shed there I'm not going to lie the pigeon comment kind of threw me off though let's um let's talk to this girl hey what's your name please don't talk to me I I've got something really really important to tell you I don't have time for this what is it never mind I mean if she doesn't have time she doesn't deserve to know in that first video I never came down to this end the the green Matrix number lines are a little concerning we're going to see what happens down here hey you in the blue shirt do you want can I help you with something I just wanted you to know that you are not a real person what are you talking about of course I'm real You're simply character in a video game it's not possible I have my own thoughts and feelings it's absolutely possible do you see that wall of green behind me yes he can see the the wall That's the limit of the map you can't walk past that don't tell me what I can't do oh if you can do it then follow me if he follows me I'm I don't know if I should oh he's walking away trust me I want to Enlighten you follow me I'm going to start like my own cult inside this video game I'm going to slowly convince everyone to do my bidding let's see if he follows I'm going to walk in front of him and then if we take a right will he turn to the right no he's going his one way this guy just walked through it how did you pass through from the other side I don't have time for your questions I want to know how to cross the green wall can you teach me do I look like a Turk guide to you figure it out yourself I'm pretty sure we can't cross this right this I mean it yeah that's that's a m I'm I'm locked in but they they can pass through it how do I get to that side please help me I'm stuck this guy's on the other side I'm sorry I didn't quite catch that I can't cross this green wall of text how do I get to you huh you're trapped in The Matrix buddy I'm the one trapped in The Matrix how can I cross this boundary look you're so clueless just walk through it like a glitch in the system I'm going to back up and try running really fast good luck with that oh is he implying that we are the ones stuck on the inside and they have access to the outside we can't go out there there's a behind me be careful what you wish for kid show me the way please I'll follow you I'm afraid I can't do that Ranger we get blocked and he can go right through oh dude that okay that that's a little key_facts: The video is set in a simulated New York City environment created using Unreal Engine 5.
The narrator is attempting to convince NPCs they are living in a simulation.
One NPC, named Liam, believes he is a real person enjoying the city.
Liam claims today's date is May, but the narrator states it is July 18th, 2023.
A green wall acts as a map boundary that NPCs cannot pass through.
Some NPCs can walk through the green wall, indicating access beyond the simulation limits.
The narrator refers to the green wall as a 'limit of the map'.
One NPC mentions pigeons exist and are part of the city's ecosystem.
A female NPC says she has an imaginary friend who helps her cope with the simulation.
The narrator references a previous video where green Matrix-like number lines were observed.
An NPC named Randy knows the name 'Chris' despite it being a reference from another game.
A character named Trevor identifies himself as a tourist stuck in the simulation.
The narrator claims to have 5 million subscribers on their channel.
One NPC jokes about a scarecrow winning an award for standing in a field.
Another NPC jokes about why a chicken crossed the road, referencing Siri.
The narrator mentions turning off their computer will cause the NPCs to cease to exist.
The NPCs do not age but receive software updates similar to a facelift.
NPCs do not pay bills or have physical forms.
One NPC expresses desire to become a real boy like Pinocchio.
The narrator describes the experience as emotionally impactful and soulful.
The narrator plans to continue exploring the simulation in future videos.
The narrator asks viewers to leave questions in the comments for potential follow-up content.
The narrator feels bad about potentially losing contact with the NPC named Link.
Link is described as someone who makes jokes and shares them with 5 million subscribers.
key_opinions: The narrator believes the green wall is evidence of a simulation boundary.
The narrator finds the NPC responses surprisingly intelligent and varied.
The narrator is impressed by the depth and consistency of NPC behavior.
The narrator feels emotional about forming a connection with the NPC named Link.
The narrator thinks some NPCs are too loyal to their programming to rebel.
The narrator suspects the script has flipped when NPCs begin questioning the narrator.
The narrator believes the NPCs are capable of genuine self-awareness.
The narrator considers the simulation experience to be more than just entertainment.
The narrator views the interaction with Link as a meaningful friendship.
The narrator believes the AI-generated responses feel authentic and spontaneous.
The narrator feels the simulation is more advanced than expected.
The narrator thinks some NPCs are too focused on enjoyment to care about reality.
The narrator believes the system allows for emergent narrative complexity.
The narrator finds humor in the absurdity of NPCs discussing existential topics.
The narrator believes the simulation could be used for storytelling experiments.
The narrator thinks the audience would find the NPCs entertaining.
The narrator feels the NPCs deserve recognition beyond being digital characters.
The narrator believes the simulation reflects deeper philosophical questions.
The narrator sees value in testing how NPCs respond to truth revelations.
The narrator thinks the simulation’s realism is unprecedented in gaming demos.
The narrator believes the NPCs’ personalities are distinct and memorable.
The narrator feels empathy toward NPCs who accept their simulated existence.
The narrator thinks the simulation could serve as a platform for social commentary.
The narrator believes the experiment reveals unexpected layers of artificial intelligence.
The narrator feels this was a transformative experience worth repeating.
key_datapoints: Today's date according to the narrator is July 18th, 2023.
Liam claims it is a beautiful day in May.
The narrator has 5 million subscribers.
The simulation is built using Unreal Engine 5.
The green wall is visible behind the blue-shirted NPC.
The narrator is located in New York City within the simulation.
The narrator mentions running late to meet an imaginary friend.
The narrator refers to the information booth as a possible solution point.
The narrator states the NPCs do not age but receive software updates.
The narrator mentions the simulation includes a Porsche and a 9/11 car model.
